articles.title: Eagles stars battle in Europe - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Victor Osimhen will lead Napoli’s attack as they seek an immediate response in a top-of-the-table clash with Atalanta BC who parades in-form forward Ademola Lookman, on Saturday (today), PUNCH Sports Extra reports.

articles.title: French far-right MP suspended after yelling, ‘Go back to Africa’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Marine Le Pen slams the decision to suspend Grégoire de Fournas following racist remark in parliament.
